location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘General Map Bahrein Island, Persian Gulf. F-956. Revised 31 December 1936’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Blueprint on paper with additions in red inkDimensions:1388 x 809 mm, on sheet 1425 x 890 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Blueprint sketch map dated 21 May 1934 and revised 31 December 1936, produced by the Bahrein Petroleum Company. Sent as an enclosure to Bahrain letter No. C. 241-10/1 of 31 March 1937.Shows the location of wells and various other facilities including water, oil and gas pipe lines; pump stations; and camp sites; with telephone and power lines, company and native roads indicated and explained in a key provided in the lower left portion of the map.Contains a note listing amendments and additions of 21st May 1934 and 13th Oct 1934.Topographical contours show the position of Jebel Dukham.Another copy of this map can be found at IOR/R/15/1/662, f 76.
